text: Jump this. Mark Larson ran a truck stop and hired minimum-wage employees. He understood the real world, and that not every kid learns sex ed from loving, caring parents. #copolitics

text: Sex-ed discussion at #COleg reminds me of my favorite Woody Allen quote, from Hannah and Her Sisters" “If Jesus came back and saw what was being done in his name, he'd never stop throwing up.” #copolitics
